roleset.name: clear headed, mentally healthy

example.name: arg1
example.text: You say it is crazy that america forces sanction on Iran , yet it is not in their economic or defence interests to allow this to happen so in fact it is perfectly sane .

example.name: arg1, empty it + concatenation
example.text: Sephiroth wondered if it was sane of him to be so grateful to someone who was only a child .

propbank.arg: of him to be so grateful to someone who was only a child

example.name: concatenation
example.text: Are you sure he was sane to want to give up something with you ?

propbank.arg: to want to give up something with you

roleset.note: SANE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, crazy.01. (from sane.01-j)
